critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing gender-based violence. It aims to establish a multi-year strategy and interagency working group to prevent and respond to such violence globally. The language is formal and policy-oriented. Joy is low as the document deals with a serious issue. Sadness is present due to the recognition of the suffering caused by gender-based violence. Anger is not explicitly conveyed but implied in the need to address the issue. Fear is present due to the concern for safety and security. Disgust is present due to the abhorrent nature of gender-based violence. Surprise is low as the document is a planned policy initiative.
